show_name: Birdy the Mighty Decode: The Cipher (OAV)
other_title: 鉄腕バーディー DECODE -THE CIPHER- (Japanese)
plot: Birdy, or Shion Arita, gets a new assignment in Kobe where Sayaka Nakasugi live now. Tsutomu Senkawa is worried about her, so Birdy decides to pay her a visit.
insert_song: "Bye Bye" (バイ バイ) by Chiba Saeko
